The authenticity of the claim was verified by comparing the map in the post with the one on the Wikimedia Commons, which is credited to the Global Terrorism Database (GTD) maintained by the National Consortium for the Study of Terrorism and Responses to Terrorism (START) at the University of Maryland. The GTD program manager confirmed that the claim was false and provided accurate data on terrorist attacks during the same period.
